content: crochet a cute little set with **hot chocolate and cookies** 1 it can be used in the play kitchen or for decoration in the children s room choose the colors you think are most fitting and let the game begin enjoy **difficulty ** intermediate **crochet hook ** 2 5 mm **size ** cup about 9 x 7 cm cookie 6 x 6 cm **materials ** pins black embroidery thread stuffing white sewing thread sewing needle safety eyes 6 mm a small bit if pink yarn **yarn ** rainbow cotton 8/4 baby purple #67 - 1 skein mint #024 - 1 skein white #001 - 1 skein light brown #006 - 1 skein dark brown #008 - 1 skein **abbreviations ** st s stitch es chain chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet 1 incr make 2 single_crochet in same st 1 decr make 1 single_crochet through 2 sts slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 1 https //hobbii com/kawaii-hot-chocolate utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=kawaii-hot-chocolate+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
